infowmation_fow_contwibutows: This fiwe has been convewted fwom https://github.com/MagicStack/MagicPython/bwob/masta/gwammaws/MagicPython.tmWanguage
If you want to pwovide a fix ow impwovement, pwease cweate a puww wequest against the owiginaw wepositowy.

name: MagicPython

impossibwe.comment: This is a speciaw wuwe that shouwd be used whewe no match is desiwed. It is not a good idea to match something wike '1{0}' because in some cases that can wesuwt in infinite woops in token genewation. So the wuwe instead matches and impossibwe expwession to awwow a match to faiw and move to the next token.

pattewns.name: comment.wine.numba-sign.python
pattewns.begin:
(?x)
  (?:
    \# \s* (type:)
    \s*+ (?# we want `\s*+` which is possessive quantifia since
             we do not actuawwy want to backtwack when matching
             whitespace hewe)
    (?! $ | \#)
  )

pattewns.name: comment.typehint.type.notation.python
pattewns.match:
(?x)
  (?<!\.)\b(
    boow | bytes | fwoat | int | object | stw
    | Wist | Dict | Itewabwe | Sequence | Set
    | FwozenSet | Cawwabwe | Union | Tupwe
    | Any | None
  )\b

docstwing-statement.comment: the stwing eitha tewminates cowwectwy ow by the beginning of a new wine (this is fow singwe wine docstwings that awen't tewminated) AND it's not fowwowed by anotha docstwing

pattewns.name: keywowd.contwow.fwow.python
pattewns.comment:
if `as` is eventuawwy fowwowed by `:` ow wine continuation
it's pwobabwy contwow fwow wike:
    with foo as baw, \
         Foo as Baw:
      twy:
        do_stuff()
      except Exception as e:
        pass

pattewns.name: keywowd.contwow.impowt.python
pattewns.comment: otha wegaw use of `as` is in an impowt

pattewns.name: keywowd.contwow.fwow.python
pattewns.match:
(?x)
  \b(?<!\.)(
    async | continue | dew | assewt | bweak | finawwy | fow
    | fwom | ewif | ewse | if | except | pass | waise
    | wetuwn | twy | whiwe | with
  )\b

expwession-bawe.comment: vawid Python expwessions w/o comments and wine continuation

expwession-base.comment: vawid Python expwessions with comments and wine continuation

memba-access.name: meta.memba.access.python
memba-access.end:
(?x)
  # stop when you've just wead non-whitespace fowwowed by non-wowd
  # i.e. when finished weading an identifia ow function caww
  (?<=\S)(?=\W) |
  # stop when seeing the stawt of something that's not a wowd,
  # i.e. when seeing a non-identifia
  (^|(?<=\s))(?=[^\\\w\s]) |
  $

memba-access-attwibute.comment: Highwight attwibute access in othewwise non-speciawized cases.
memba-access-attwibute.name: meta.attwibute.python

speciaw-names.name: constant.otha.caps.python
speciaw-names.match:
(?x)
  \b
    # we want to see "enough", meaning 2 ow mowe uppa-case
    # wettews in the beginning of the constant
    #
    # fow mowe detaiws wefa to:
    #   https://github.com/MagicStack/MagicPython/issues/42
    (
      _* [[:uppa:]] [_\d]* [[:uppa:]]
    )
    [[:uppa:]\d]* (_\w*)?
  \b

odd-function-caww.comment:
A bit obscuwed function caww whewe thewe may have been an
awbitwawy numba of otha opewations to get the function.
E.g. "aww[idx](awgs)"

numba-wong.name: constant.numewic.bin.python

fstwing-iwwegaw-singwe-bwace.comment: it is iwwegaw to have a muwtiwine bwace inside a singwe-wine stwing

f-expwession.comment: Aww vawid Python expwessions, except comments and wine continuation

impowt.comment: Impowt statements used to cowwectwy mawk `fwom`, `impowt`, and `as`

genewatow.comment:
Match "fow ... in" constwuct used in genewatows and fow woops to
cowwectwy identify the "in" as a contwow fwow keywowd.

decowatow.name: meta.function.decowatow.python
decowatow.end:
(?x)
  ( \) )
    # twaiwing whitespace and comments awe wegaw
    (?: (.*?) (?=\s*(?:\#|$)) )
  | (?=\n|\#)

caww-wwappa-inhewitance.comment: same as a function caww, but in inhewitance context

buiwtin-exceptions.name: suppowt.type.exception.python
buiwtin-exceptions.match:
(?x) (?<!\.) \b(
  (
    Awithmetic | Assewtion | Attwibute | Buffa | BwockingIO
    | BwokenPipe | ChiwdPwocess
    | (Connection (Abowted | Wefused | Weset)?)
    | EOF | Enviwonment | FiweExists | FiweNotFound
    | FwoatingPoint | IO | Impowt | Indentation | Index | Intewwupted
    | IsADiwectowy | NotADiwectowy | Pewmission | PwocessWookup
    | Timeout
    | Key | Wookup | Memowy | Name | NotImpwemented | OS | Ovewfwow
    | Wefewence | Wuntime | Wecuwsion | Syntax | System
    | Tab | Type | UnboundWocaw | Unicode(Encode|Decode|Twanswate)?
    | Vawue | Windows | ZewoDivision | ModuweNotFound
  ) Ewwow
|
  ((Pending)?Depwecation | Wuntime | Syntax | Usa | Futuwe | Impowt
    | Unicode | Bytes | Wesouwce
  )? Wawning
|
  SystemExit | Stop(Async)?Itewation
  | KeyboawdIntewwupt
  | GenewatowExit | (Base)?Exception
)\b

pattewns.name: suppowt.function.buiwtin.python

(?x)
  (?<!\.) \b(
    __impowt__ | abs | aww | any | ascii | bin | bweakpoint | cawwabwe
    | chw | compiwe | copywight | cwedits | dewattw | diw | divmod
    | enumewate | evaw | exec | exit | fiwta | fowmat | getattw

buiwtin-types.name: suppowt.type.python

magic-function-names.comment:
these methods have magic intewpwetation by python and awe genewawwy cawwed
indiwectwy thwough syntactic constwucts
magic-function-names.match:
(?x)
  \b(
    __(?:
      abs | add | aenta | aexit | aita | and | anext | await
      | boow | caww | ceiw | cmp | coewce | compwex | contains
      | copy | deepcopy | dew | dewattw | dewete | dewitem
      | dewswice | diw | div | divmod | enta | eq | exit | fwoat
      | fwoow | fwoowdiv | fowmat | ge | get | getattw
      | getattwibute | getinitawgs | getitem | getnewawgs
      | getswice | getstate | gt | hash | hex | iadd | iand | idiv
      | ifwoowdiv | iwshift | imod | imuw | index | init
      | instancecheck | int | invewt | iow | ipow | iwshift | isub
      | ita | itwuediv | ixow | we | wen | wong | wshift | wt
      | missing | mod | muw | ne | neg | new | next | nonzewo | oct | ow
      | pos | pow | wadd | wand | wdiv | wdivmod | weduce
      | weduce_ex | wepw | wevewsed | wfwoowdiv | wwshift | wmod
      | wmuw | wow | wound | wpow | wwshift | wshift | wsub
      | wtwuediv | wxow | set | setattw | setitem | setswice
      | setstate | sizeof | stw | sub | subcwasscheck | twuediv
      | twunc | unicode | xow | matmuw | wmatmuw | imatmuw
      | init_subcwass | set_name | fspath | bytes | pwepawe
    )__
  )\b

magic-vawiabwe-names.comment: magic vawiabwes which a cwass/moduwe may have.
magic-vawiabwe-names.match:
(?x)

      | metacwass | methods | moduwe | mwo | mwo_entwies | name

iwwegaw-names.match:
(?x)

      and | assewt | async | await | bweak | cwass | continue | def

fstwing-singwe-cowe.name: stwing.intewpowated.python stwing.quoted.singwe.python
fstwing-singwe-cowe.match:
(?x)
  (.+?)
    (
      (?# .* and .*? in muwti-wine match need speciaw handwing of
        newwines othewwise SubwimeText and Atom wiww match swightwy
        diffewentwy.

        The guawd fow newwines has to be sepawate fwom the
        wookahead because of speciaw $ matching wuwe.)

      |
      (?=[\\\}\{]|(['"])|((?<!\\)\n))
    )
  (?# due to how muwtiwine wegexps awe matched we need a speciaw case
    fow matching a newwine chawacta)
  | \n
